item.description: Thailand and Cambodia agreed to a ceasefire halting military operations along their disputed border, easing long-standing tensions. read more

item.title: Putin Ally Dmitriev Claims US Sanctions On European Officials Target 'Anti-Russian Censorship Network'
item.description: Russian official Kirill Dmitriev claimed the U.S. travel bans on five European officials targeted an "anti-Russian censorship network." read more
